steps.title: Lionel Messi doesn’t publicly share his phone number.
steps.content: Lionel Messi doesn’t publicly share his phone number. Directly calling Messi’s phone is not an option—instead, reach out to someone on Messi’s team at Inter Miami FC. While Inter Miami FC also doesn’t advertise a public phone number, you may call their Ticketing department at +1 305-428-0611 and ask if one of their representatives can help you. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Email Messi through his official website or sports team.
steps.content: Email Messi through his official website or sports team. Send an email to info@messi.com to get in touch with the management team of Messi’s official website—they may be able to pass your message on to Messi. [2] X Research source Messi’s official website can be found at Messi.com . The site documents important information on Messi’s career, including notable matches, awards, and press appearances.

steps.title: Reach out to Messi through one of his verified social media accounts.
steps.content: Reach out to Messi through one of his verified social media accounts. Leave a comment on one of Messi’s posts or send him a direct message. Make sure you’re contacting him via one of his official accounts, not a fan or impersonation account. Follow these links to Messi’s verified profiles: Facebook: Leo Messi Instagram: @leomessi YouTube: @LeoMessi Lionel Messi does not currently have an account on X (formerly known as Twitter), but you can keep up to date with Team Messi , the official fan group account.

steps.title: Send fan mail to Inter Miami FC.
steps.content: Send fan mail to Inter Miami FC. If you want to express your admiration for Messi or request an autographed photo, send a fan mail letter to Inter Miami FC. Include a self-addressed and stamped return envelope along with your message and send it to the following address: Lionel Messi c/o Inter Miami FC 1350 NW 55th St. Ft. Lauderdale, FL 33309

steps.title: Agent: Jorge Messi at Leo Messi Management
steps.content: Agent: Jorge Messi at Leo Messi Management Contact Messi’s official sports agent for commercial opportunities like job offers, TV appearances, or press engagements. Send a letter with your messages and requests to: [3] X Research source Jorge Messi c/o Leo Messi Management Avinguda Diagonal, 682 #9A Barcelona 08034 SPAIN If you live outside of Spain, make sure to affix your letter with international postage to make sure it arrives safely.

steps.title: Manager: Inter Miami FC
steps.content: Manager: Inter Miami FC Reach out to Messi’s management company for general inquiries about his contact information and career. Messi is managed by his current soccer team, which can be contacted at the following address: [4] X Research source Inter Miami FC 1350 NW 55th Street Ft. Lauderdale, FL, 33309

steps.title: Publicist: Inter Miami FC’s Public Relations Department
steps.content: Publicist: Inter Miami FC’s Public Relations Department Send mail to Messi’s publicist for interview requests, guest appearances, or other opportunities for publicity. Contact the public relations department of Messi’s management company at this address: Inter Miami FC c/o Public Relations Dept. 1350 NW 55th Street Ft. Lauderdale, FL, 33309

steps.title: Try to meet Messi at one of his soccer matches.
steps.content: Try to meet Messi at one of his soccer matches. Review the Inter Miami FC game schedule and find a game that you can travel to. Wait outside the stadium before or after the match for the best chance of meeting Messi . [5] X Research source Keep in mind that other fans will likely also be trying to meet Messi, so it may be crowded. Messi will probably also be surrounded by protective security, so you may spot him but not actually be able to get close to him. If possible, contact the stadium to see if they offer VIP entry or stadium tours before the matches. If so, you may be able to spot Messi warming up before the game. Don’t do anything illegal to trespass into the stadium or have a conversation with Messi—you can always try again at another match.

steps.title: Purchase a ticket to a Lionel Messi meet and greet.
steps.content: Purchase a ticket to a Lionel Messi meet and greet. Keep an eye out for any meet-and-greets that Messi may be offering in the future. Some charities auction off meetings with Messi, or he may offer VIP experiences before or after a match. Follow a Messi fan page to be updated on Messi meet-and-greet events in your area. Try @messicrews on Instagram or @WeAreMessi on X (formerly known as Twitter).

steps.title: Attend events hosted by one of Lionel Messi’s charities.
steps.content: Attend events hosted by one of Lionel Messi’s charities. Messi sponsors and partners with many charities, including UNICEF and the Leo Messi Foundation . [6] X Research source Try to get tickets to events hosted by his charity foundation, which may give you an opportunity to meet Messi in person.
